title: The Only One Who Knows
detail_text: <:th_ch0212/>Hey, Nozomi. Stop bothering Ayumu and Rina.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0007/>Huh? What did I do to them?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0212/>Don’t play dumb with me. You haven’t told them what Washi Washi actually is.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0007/>Oh, yeah...... That. Well… it’s a bit hard to explain......<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0212/>Well, I’ve heard a little about them. Kanan’s been doing a trial version of it, right? If you’re fine with it, why don’t I help you teach them?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0007/>You really care about your friends, don’tcha, Mia-chan?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0212/>Th-that’s not the point! I was already a college student in the States, so I’m more of an adult than they are. Shouldn’t I have to do something about it? I should be the one to teach them what the true Washi Washi is.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0007/>I see~ Mia-chan is an adult! ♪ I’ll teach you what it is then. To Washi Washi is to......<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0212/>Huh? Wh-what are you doing, Nozomi? That’s scary......<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0007/>Don’t be scared, don’t be scared! ♪ Just come over here, and I’ll teach you~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
